headline: ComEd, Metropolitan Mayor’s Caucus Spark Joy with 25 Grants Supporting Holiday Light Events
summary: CHICAGO, October 22, 2025--As the holiday season draws near, ComEd and the Metropolitan Mayors Caucus are empowering communities across northern Illinois with grants to help light up the winter months with festive cheer. Through the annual Powering the Holidays grant program, 25 municipalities and nonprofit organizations will receive awards of up to $2,500 to support local holiday light displays and events that bring neighbors together in cultural celebrations.
